inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addSkillBonus('Alchemy', 'Stackable', 15); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Self Sufficient
description: You are able to survive better than most in nature, and know your way around various species of plants.  You gain +15 on Alchemy checks.
